item.title: About
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Established by Max Rodriguez, a military veteran and experienced appliance repairman, in 2007, the A to Z Appliance Repair team has nearly 15 years of experience helping home and business owners get their appliances back in peak working condition. We're pleased to provide you with a wide range of services from refrigerator repair to washer dryer repair, and we can even service most commercial appliances. We're a local, family-owned appliance installation and repair service, and our professionals are committed to helping our area neighbors get the quality appliance repairs they need at a price that won't break the bank. From waiving the service call fee with any repair to backing our precision workmanship with a one-year parts warranty, A to Z Appliance Repair is here to bring you the best in washing machine repair, water heater repair, and more.

Conveniently located in Navarre, A to Z Appliance Repair provides professional appliance repairmen throughout the region. We serve both residential and commercial customers in towns like Destin, Fort Walton Beach, Santa Rosa Beach, Gulf Breeze, and Shalimar. With 24-hour emergency appliance repair services available, our professionals can help whenever you need washer dryer repair or refrigerator repair. So when you need an appliance installation and repair company you can trust for quality, customer service, and affordable pricing, we're here to take great care of you. Call now or send us an e-mail to learn more about how A to Z Appliance Repair can serve you.

To provide you with the utmost protection, security, and peace of mind, A to Z Appliance Repair is both licensed and insured.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: A guy named Max came out and fixed my Refrigerator and was very fast and affordable. I would recommend him if you have a problem with your refrigerator.

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Services Offered

If you have an appliance that's on the fritz, don't wait: call or e-mail A to Z Appliance Repair today. We're please to offer complete appliance installation and repair service in Navarre and throughout the area, and we can help get your appliances up and running again ASAP. Malfunctioning appliances can turn even the most well-ordered home or business into a chaotic mess in the blink of an eye, but with A to Z Appliance Repair on your side, we can get your appliance fixed and your household or company back to running smoothly again in no time at all. Experience the A to Z Appliance Repair difference when you call now!

Customer Service Is Our Number-One Priority

At A to Z Appliance Repair, we're here to take care of your appliances, but we're also here to take care of you. We believe in providing all of our customers with the absolute best in customer service, and we'll go the extra mile to make certain you're satisfied. Unlike some appliance repair companies that show up late—or not at all—A to Z Appliance Repair will never waste your valuable time. We'll troubleshoot your malfunctioning appliance's problems, fix them, and even offer pointers on how to avoid similar issues in the future. Our team understands that to keep your home or business running smoothly, you need to have your washing machine repair or dishwasher repaired completed both correctly and as quickly as possible—and we work hard to help eliminate the inconvenience of a broken-down appliance from your life. Don't settle for anything but the best. Contact A to Z Appliance Repair to get the superior customer service you deserve.
  • Service call fee waived with repair
  • One-year parts warranties
  • Se habla espanol

Professional Appliance Repairmen

Founded by military veteran Max Rodriguez in 2007, A to Z Appliance Repair may be a relatively young company, but that doesn't mean our professionals are inexperienced! Our team has nearly 15 years of experience in the appliance installation and repair business, and we strive to put our expertise to work for every customer. Whether we're providing you with commercial dryer repair or residential refrigerator repair, the A to Z Appliance Repair pros use our extensive knowledge and hands-on skill to accurately and efficiently diagnose and repair your appliances. And with our substantial industry experience, we have what it takes to provide top-quality appliance repair services for a huge range of appliance makes and models. From dishwasher repair to electric hot water heater repair, garage door opener repair to washing machine repair, we'll get the job done right!

Affordable Quality

At A to Z Appliance Repair, we believe that you shouldn't have to blow your budget just to get reliable appliance repairs. That's why we're dedicated to providing you with the quality appliance repair parts and service you can count on, at a price that's cost-effective for you. Our appliance repairmen work efficiently and effectively to minimize your labor costs, and we use only quality parts to make certain the job is done right the first time. And unlike some appliance repair companies, we waive the service call fee with all completed repairs. That's just one of the many ways A to Z Appliance Repair goes above and beyond to ensure you get the most affordable refrigerator repair, washer-dryer repair, or other appliance repair service in the greater Navarre area.

Full-Service Appliance Repairs

In addition to endeavoring to make your appliance repair service affordable, we also try to make it convenient. That's why our team of experts offers such a wide variety of appliance service options: We're here to be your one-stop shop for appliance repairs regardless of whether you need your garage door opener repaired or your electric hot water heater serviced. Working with major appliance repair services for residential and commercial customers, we're available to work on just about any appliance from all of the leading manufacturers. A to Z Appliance Repair services models from the following brands:
  • Asko
  • Amana
  • Avanti
  • Caloric
  • Modern Maid
  • Bosch
  • Broan
  • Carrier
  • Dacor
  • Elkay
  • Fedders
  • Emerson
  • Frigidaire
  • Gaggenau
  • Gerald
  • GE
  • Gibson
  • Glenwood
  • Hardwick
  • Insinkerator
  • Jenn Air
  • Kelvinator
  • LG
  • Maycor
  • Maytag
  • Miele
  • Nutone
  • O'Keefe
  • Merritt
  • Panasonic
  • Roper
  • Sanyo
  • Sears
  • Sharp
  • Speed Queen
  • Sub-Zero
  • Tappan
  • Thermador
  • U-Line
  • Viking
  • Waste King
  • Welbilt
  • Westinghouse
  • Whirlpool
  • And more!

item.title: Appliance Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Have the heating coils on your stove stopped reaching high temperatures? Are you sick of mopping up puddles of water underneath your refrigerator? Is your garbage disposal starting to emit a rancid odor? Whatever seems to be plaguing your major household appliances, the professionals at A to Z Appliance Repair are at your service. We've been in the business for nearly 15 years, and the wide range of appliance malfunctions we've seen makes us able to diagnose and repair yours with minimal effort. So if your broken kitchen appliances or washer and dryer aren't working at full capacity, don't let your personal convenience hang in the balance. Whether it's dryer repair, refrigerator repair, or washer repair, our experts in Navarre can handle it. Call A to Z Appliance Repair to get your life back on track! Servicing a plethora of household appliances, we pride ourselves on our stellar workmanship and attentive customer care. At A to Z Appliance Repair, our professionals are well-versed in the complexities of virtually all large household appliances, so whether you need dishwasher repair, oven repair, or any other major appliance repair, we'll make sure you're taken care of. Our wide array of appliance repair services includes solutions for your:
  • Dishwasher
  • Dryer
  • Washing machine
  • Refrigerator
  • Electric water heater
  • Garbage disposal
  • Built-in oven
  • Oven
  • Range
  • Stove
  • Microwave
  • And more!
If you've got a malfunctioning appliance, don't waste your hard-earned cash or well-deserved free time on buying a replacement model. With all the time and money it takes to purchase and install a brand-new appliance, you're much better off calling in the reliable experts at A to Z Appliance Repair. We'll have your appliances back up and running in no time, which means you'll be able to enjoy the conveniences of modern living once again. From refrigerators to dishwashers to dryers, there's almost no major appliance repair we can't handle. We also service floor buffers and central vacuum systems.

Cooktop and Stove Repair

When you're planning a big dinner party, the last thing you want to deal with is a burnt-out heating element or a busted broiler. If something goes wrong with your cooktop, stove, or oven, the likelihood that you'll actually have the time and energy to purchase a new one is minuscule. When you're facing broken cooking equipment, call the A to Z Appliance Repair pros for oven repair, range repair, stove repair, and more! No matter what seems to be ailing your kitchen appliances, our experts will make sure you're in good hands.

Garbage Disposal Repair

A garbage disposal is an excellent way to get rid of food waste while maintaining your kitchen's cleanliness. However, a malfunctioning garbage disposal can wreak havoc on your convenience and tidiness. Whether you've got a damaged blade or ruined seal, the symptoms of a broken garbage disposal can range from irritating noises to serious leaks. At A to Z Appliance Repair, we offer superior garbage disposal repair services designed to restore your kitchen's convenience and functionality.

Microwave Repair

Today, most of us depend on microwaves for quick food preparation, reheating meals, or cooking frozen food on the go. That's what makes a broken or malfunctioning microwave such a nuisance. At A to Z Appliance Repair, we're able to fix a variety of over-the-range microwave models for the ultimate in convenience and reliability. At A to Z Appliance Repair, our customers are our top priority. We take customer service very seriously, and we're committed to your total satisfaction. For your convenience and complete peace of mind, we even offer 24/7 emergency services! Don't attempt to fix an appliance yourself, but don't put off a repair either. Instead, when you have appliance problems in or around Navarre, call our pros for help today!

item.title: Washing Machine Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
When your washing machine is broken, don't give the laundry time to pile up—call A to Z Appliance Repair today. Our professional appliance repairmen offer complete washer-dryer repair service in Navarre, and we can help get your washing machine back in working order promptly. So instead of accumulating mountains of laundry that can overwhelm you and create even more disruption in your life, contact A to Z Appliance Repair today and put an end to the inconvenience of a malfunctioning washer!

From leaks to not spinning to just not turning on at all, there are a number of common problems your washing machine can develop over time. Commonly reported washing machine repair issues include:
  • Not agitating or spinning
  • Not draining
  • Not filling
  • Leaking
  • Not cycling properly
  • Not starting
If you're experiencing any of these issues with your washer, call in A to Z Appliance Repair. We're a licensed, insured appliance repair company, and we have almost 15 years of experience tackling washer and dryer repairs of all kinds. Instead of spending several frustrating hours trying to locate your washing machine's problems yourself, A to Z Appliance Repair can use our expertise and hands-on skill to efficiently—and accurately—diagnose and repair the problem. Whether it's a faulty lid switch or a worn-out water pump, our technicians have what it takes to troubleshoot and resolve a full range of washing machine repair issues.

While some appliance repair companies only work on a select few brands, A to Z Appliance Repair makes washer and dryer repair easy by servicing virtually all makes and models. It makes no difference to us whether you need Maytag washing machine repair or GE washing machine repair: Our professionals are here to provide you with quality workmanship and repair service either way.

So if your finicky washing machine is making you pull out your hair or you're contemplating purchasing a new washer because your old one won't start, A to Z Appliance Repair can help you. Our washer-dryer repairs are so cost-effective that we can get your unit back in tip-top condition for far less than the hundreds of dollars a new washing machine would cost. And with our prompt, precise appliance repair services we can help you put the hassles of a malfunctioning washer behind you. With our affordable services, exceptional quality, and commitment to fantastic customer care, you can't go wrong with A to Z Appliance Repair. If you're looking for a professional appliance service in Navarre, you've come to the right place. Get started by calling or sending us an e-mail today!

item.title: Appliance Installation
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Whether your washing machine is damaged beyond repair or it's finally time to switch out that old, inefficient refrigerator, A to Z Appliance Repair is the professional to call for expert appliance installers. We provide precision appliance installation to residential customers throughout the Emerald Coast, and we're ready to make certain both your home and your new appliance get the top-notch treatment they deserve. From our affordable prices to our quality workmanship, A to Z Appliance Repair is your answer for superior appliance installation in Navarre. Call now!

From replacement appliances to new appliance installation, quality matters when you're putting in a new washing machine, dryer, or refrigerator. Amateur appliance installs can damage your home, harm your appliance, and even create safety risks. So don't chance it with a DIY installation—leave your new appliance safely in the hands of the professionals at A to Z Appliance Repair. Our appliance installers have nearly 15 years of experience in the business, and we're well-versed in the proper installation of just about any major household appliance from all of the leading manufacturers. We provide appliance install service for:
  • Refrigerators
  • Washers
  • Dryers
  • Ovens, ranges, and cooktops
  • Garbage disposals
  • And more!
At A to Z Appliance Repair, we work to install appliances in the most efficient, effective way possible. We ensure that all surrounding surfaces (including walls, floors, and counters) are protected during the installation process, and we double-check all water and electrical connections to prevent leaks, fire hazards, and other potentially dangerous situations. With our meticulous appliance installation services, you can be certain the job is done right the first time.

When you purchase a new appliance, make sure you get the most out of your investment with professional appliance installation from A to Z Appliance Repair. Specializing in affordable, expert appliance installs in and around Navarre, our team works hard to make certain your new dishwasher, oven, or other appliance can perform its best for years to come. And with our exceptional customer service our appliance installer pros take care of you as well as your new appliance and your home. If you're ready to experience the A to Z Appliance Repair difference, give us a call today!

A to Z Appliance Repair is a residential appliance installation specialist. Our appliance installers are not available to install appliances on boats. We apologize for any inconvenience.

item.title: Dryer Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Is the loud thumping sound coming out of your dryer driving you crazy? Is the lack of heat in your dryer leaving your clothes cold and damp? Does it take hours for one drying cycle to finish? Having a properly working dryer makes laundry a much simpler chore, but there are countless things that can go wrong. The good news is that the dryer repair professionals at A to Z Appliance Repair are equipped with nearly 15 years of experience and an uncompromising work ethic, and we'll be able to have your dryer up and running in no time. With excellent troubleshooting and diagnostic skills, we're the go-to team of washer and dryer repair professionals in Navarre. If you're dealing with a troublesome dryer, call A to Z Appliance Repair today!

With a considerable amount of hands-on training, our in-depth experience is more valuable than any dryer repair manual. We'll figure out exactly what's causing the problem and devise the most effective washer-dryer repair plan. A list of common problems includes:
  • No heat
  • No tumbling
  • Slow drying
  • Too much heat
  • Loud noises
  • Unpleasant smells
  • Torn or marked clothes
Regardless of whether it's GE dryer repair or Maytag dryer repair, we should be able to fix whatever is wrong with your model. No clothes dryer repair job is the same, and that's why the pros at A to Z Appliance Repair rely so heavily on prior experience. We build on our existing knowledge to provide you with the most satisfactory dryer repairs in the area.

Whether your clothing is coming out of your dryer smelling musty or the clothes drum isn't tumbling effectively, clothes dryer repair is no easy task. You might be tempted to try your hand at DIY dryer repair, but the size and complexity of most dryer models will make that a very difficult task. Whether you're facing Bosch, Sears, or Maytag dryer repair, you'll likely find yourself totally confounded by the mechanical jargon in your dryer repair manual. Save yourself time and hassle by calling in the pros from A to Z Appliance Repair! Our affordable dryer repairs will restore your levels of convenience without blowing your budget.

For the most complete range of washer-dryer repair service in town, A to Z Appliance Repair is your full-service expert on the Emerald Coast. If you call today, we'll waive your service call fee with a dryer repair!

item.title: Dishwasher Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Owning a dishwasher is a wonderful way to simplify daily chores and save hours of your time per week. Rather than spending chunks of time hovered over the sink scrubbing dirty dishes, you're able to set them in your dishwasher and let the wonders of modern technology do the rest. But what happens when your dishwasher stops working properly? You can be left with puddles of water on your kitchen floor, loud noises, unclean dishes, and more. If your dishwasher has stopped functioning properly, you'll want to get dishwasher repair ASAP. At A to Z Appliance Repair, we specialize in dishwasher repairs of all capacities, which means we'll be more than able to identify the source of your problem and fix it with efficiency and accuracy. From dishwasher rack repair to door gasket replacement, we do it all.

With nearly 15 years of experience performing appliance repairs, the pros at A to Z Appliance Repair are Navarre's premier dishwasher repair team. We're well-versed in dishwashers of all makes and models, so whether you need Bosch dishwasher repair, GE dishwasher repair, or Maytag dishwasher repair, we'll be able to figure out exactly what's causing your appliance woes. Common problems requiring dishwasher repairs include:
  • Poor cleaning
  • Unpleasant smells
  • Loud noises
  • Leaks
  • Poor draining
  • Not starting
If you're experiencing the inconveniences of a malfunctioning dishwasher, call the pros at A to Z Appliance Repair. We'll provide you with the drain valve, door latch, or dishwasher rack repair you need to get your daily chores back on track. From Maytag dishwasher repair to GE dishwasher repair, there's virtually nothing we can't fix.

At A to Z Appliance Repair, we value our customers above everything. When it comes to dishwasher repairs, we're committed to providing you with the highest level of workmanship imaginable, and we'll stop at nothing to make sure you're satisfied with the job. Our services are extremely affordable and convenient—in fact, we even offer 24-hour emergency services! If you're ready for the quality dishwasher repair you need, call A to Z Appliance Repair today!

item.title: Refrigerator Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Does your refrigerator make loud, rumbling sounds while it cycles on and off? Does your food keep freezing, no matter how many times you adjust the thermostat? Has your water dispenser stopped working? Despite the levels of convenience that refrigerators offer, there's almost no end to the headaches you'll endure when yours stops working. Whether your refrigerator is leaking or not cooling effectively, you can wind up with a pretty sizable mess on your hands if you don't call for professional refrigerator repair immediately. At A to Z Appliance Repair, we offer a wide range of refrigeration repair services, and we'll be able to identify exactly what's causing the problem. There's no other appliance repair specialist like us in Navarre and the rest of the Emerald Coast, so give us a call today for more information!

With nearly 15 years of experience in the refrigerators repair business, we've cultivated a deep understanding of all refrigerator makes and models. Whether you require Whirlpool or GE refrigerator repair, we'll have your unit fixed up in no time because there's virtually no limit to our expertise. When it comes to refrigerator repairs, we've seen it all. A list of common refrigerator problems includes:
  • Insufficient cooling
  • Inadvertent freezing
  • Defective interior lights
  • Water leaks
  • Clogged drains
  • Loud noises
If refrigeration repair is on your horizon, don't hesitate to call A to Z Appliance Repair. We're the professionals you can count on for reliable service and affordable rates. No matter how complicated the refrigerators repair services become, our high degree of workmanship enables us to perform at any level of complexity. In our years of experience, we've seen it all. From Maytag refrigerator repair to GE refrigerator repair, our professionals are capable of repairing all major brands and models.

When you hire A to Z Appliance Repair for your refrigeration repair needs, you'll see the difference right away. Our professionals are committed to excellence and will deliver nothing short of the best possible craftsmanship in Navarre. If you're in the market for a refrigerators repair specialist, look no further! Call today to schedule an appointment, and we'll waive the service call fee with the completed repair.

item.title: Eletric Water Heater Repair
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
Whether you start your day with a hot shower first thing in the morning or do loads of laundry from the comfort of your own home, having full-time access to hot water is something we all can appreciate. But when your water heater starts to malfunction, your daily comforts can suffer immeasurably. From water tanks that take too long to heat to units that don't heat at all, there are a number of problems that can plague hot water heaters. At A to Z Appliance Repair, we offer premium electric water heater repair services to customers throughout the Navarre area. In addition, we even offer replacement water heater installation if your model is beyond repair. No matter what seems to be at the source of your hot water woes, our water heater service is sure to be exactly what you need. Call today to speak with one of our professionals!

At A to Z Appliance Repair, we put our 14 years of experience to work for you. Our professionals know all the ins and outs of electric water heater repair, so you can be certain that any water heater service you receive from us will be top-notch. Hot water heaters can experience any number of problems, but our specialized troubleshooting and diagnostic skills allow us to figure out exactly what's wrong your electric water heater and devise a plan to fix it as efficiently as possible. Some of the more common problems requiring hot water heater repair include:
  • Malfunctioning heating elements
  • Degraded anode rods
  • Broken thermostats
  • Damaged valves
  • Leaks
  • And more!
When it comes to a malfunctioning electric water heater, DIY repair is not recommended. In fact, attempting to perform water heater repair all on your own can be damaging to your equipment, if not downright dangerous. Given the propensity of hot water heaters to spout leaks, you could be putting yourself and your home at risk for electrocution and fire hazards. Rather than committing yourself to all that time, hassle, and potential danger, call in the pros from A to Z Appliance Repair. With our years of experience, we make water heater service look like a cinch. And if your electric unit is broken beyond repair, we even offer safe, thorough water heater installation!

At A to Z Appliance Repair, we pride ourselves on excellent customer service and long-lasting results. Our workmanship is second to none, and with our affordable rates, you'll get dependable electric hot water heater repair without breaking the bank. If you're ready to restore your daily conveniences and luxuries with reliable hot water, try out our expert water heater service! Call today.

item.title: Welcome to A to Z Appliance Repair!
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded: We are your answer for everything from dishwasher repair to washing machine repair, and we'll stop at nothing to make certain that your malfunction is resolved as quickly as possible.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: When it comes to household appliances, the conveniences and the frustrations come in equal measure. When your appliances are working without any glitches, they allow you to complete necessary chores effortlessly and seamlessly. But as soon as your refrigerator stops cooling, your cooktop stops heating or your dryer is no longer drying, don’t let your daily routine or modern luxuries suffer, call A to Z Appliance Repair instead! Our trained specialists offer major appliance repair services to residential customers in Fort Walton, Mary Esther, Navarre, Shalimar, Niceville, Destin, Miramar Beach and Santa Rosa Beach. We vow to treat you to the most outstanding customer service in the area. Whether you need a garbage disposal replaced or a standard washing machine repair for your home, you can count on A to Z Appliance Repair for the highest quality workmanship possible. Call us today!
Providing Fort Walton, Mary Esther, Navarre, Shalimar, Niceville, Destin, Miramar Beach and Santa Rosa Beach with major appliance repair & installation services for more than 15 years

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: mcastre
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
